name: Pyramid (itch) (johnnyfreak)
description:
This game has been created for the first GoGodotJam. #GoGodotJam

The goal of this small game is to grow your pyramid as tall as you can.
Stack the blocks to reach high!

Press any key to start the game.

In game, press any key to release a block. You must wait for it to land before you can release another one.

Each block has different form and weight.

Update: small update to change the font since the previous did not show the number zero.
